commands.name: !picks [playerId]
commands.description: Displays the picks of an individual player

commands.name: !bonuses
commands.description: Displays the bonuses awarded to all players

commands.name: !bonuses [playerId]
commands.description: Displays the bonuses awarded to a particular player

commands.name: !add-celeb [name]
commands.description: Add a celeb to the list of those being tracked.

commands.name: !resurrect [celebId]
commands.description: [Debug Only] Bring someone back from the grave.
